description: When the authorizing provider for a prescription is not in the provider database, a free-text provider may be entered in ambulatory pharmacy. Any IDs that are collected for that provider are stored in this table.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TXT_AUTHPROV_OTH_ID
columns.description: The other ID of the authorizing provider if the provider does not exist in Epic. This column stores the ID type for other IDs the provider may have (for instance, a state-specific ID number, or the Texas DPS number).

columns.name: TXT_AUTHPROV_TYP_ID
columns.description: The ID type for other IDs of the authorizing provider if the provider does not exist in Epic. This column stores the ID type for other IDs the provider may have (for instance, a state-specific ID number, or the Texas DPS number).

columns.name: TXT_AUTHPROV_TYP_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.
